name: Knix
body:
### Welcome to Knix.

![screenshot](http://monsterkodi.github.io/knix/images/knix01.png)

```
  {% highlight coffee %}
  # _________________________________________________________________________ widget test

  wid.get
      type:   'button'
      text:   'hello'
      parent: 'menu'
      onClick: ->
          wid.get
              title:     'hello'
              hasSize:   true
              width:     200
              minWidth:  130
              children: \
              [
                  id:         'slider'
                  type:       'slider'
                  hasKnob:    true
                  hasBar:     true
                  value:      50.0
                  valueMax:   200.0
                  valueStep:  1
              ,
                  type:       'value'
                  value:      50
                  valueMin:   20
                  valueMax:   80
                  format:     "%3.2f"
                  connect:
                      signal: 'slider:onValue'
                      slot:   'setValue'
              ,
                  type:       'relative'
                  child:
                      type:       'button'
                      text:       'ok'
                      class:      'top-right'
                      onClick:    -> @getWindow().close()
              ]
    {% endhighlight %}
```
